name: tray-hyperx
description: Windows tray app for HyperX Cloud Flight Wireless (battery/mute/charging).

scripts.pack:clean: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$p=Get-Process HyperXTray -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if($p){$p|Stop-Process -Force}; $q=Get-CimInstance Win32_Process -Filter "Name='node.exe'" | ? { $_.CommandLine -match 'sensor\.js' }; if($q){$q|%{Stop-Process -Id $_.ProcessId -Force}}; Start-Sleep -s 1; if(Test-Path dist){Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist}"
